column2: I can feel their eyes upon me everywhere I go: disappointment, despise. I gathered my vassals and, upon my honor, pledged peace for my realm. Now, I've broken that pledge. My reasons be damned: they won't listen, and my reputation amongst them and the greater realm will suffer for my trespass.
I suppose that's the price I must pay.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] desires to get involved in some sort of hobby.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] would like to win a war.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] would like to crush the infidel under his boot and win a holy war.

[This.GetTitledFirstName] commits to no offensive war for 15 years. In return, [This.GetSheHe] will appreciate improved vassal opinion and a liege levy boost for the pledge's duration. [This.GetSheHeCap] will face a stiff penalty if [This.GetHerHis] pledge is broken. Answering allies' calls to arms is still permitted during the pledge.
§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! upholds [This.GetHerHis] pledge of peace for §Y15§! years, waging no offensive wars.
